faith.title: Our Faith
faith.subtitle: The church adheres to the tenets of Baptist faith.

beliefs.title: The Triune God
beliefs.content: We believe in the only true God, eternally existing in three persons: Father, Son, and Holy Spirit, equal in power, honor, and glory. He is the Creator and Ruler of the universe.

beliefs.title: Jesus Christ
beliefs.content: We believe Jesus Christ, the Son of God, existed from the beginning and is equal with God. He became man, conceived by the Holy Spirit and born of the Virgin Mary, lived a sinless life, died on the cross as a sacrifice for sins, rose from the dead on the third day, ascended back to the right hand of the Father, and will return as King of kings and Lord of lords.

beliefs.title: The Holy Spirit
beliefs.content: We believe the Holy Spirit is equal with the Father and the Son. He convicts people of their need for salvation. At the moment of repentance, the Holy Spirit indwells the believer, guides them into truth, empowers them for witnessing, and grants spiritual gifts for service.

beliefs.title: The Bible
beliefs.content: We believe the entire Old and New Testaments are the inspired Word of God. Written by human hands but completely accurate and without error, the Bible is the supreme authority for faith and conduct.

beliefs.title: Salvation
beliefs.content: We believe man was created in God's image but fell into sin. Salvation is only through faith in the blood of Jesus Christ. We are justified by grace, not by works. A truly born-again believer is eternally secure in Christ.

beliefs.title: Ordinances
beliefs.content: We believe in baptism by immersion as a witness of faith, symbolizing death, burial, and resurrection with Christ. The Lord's Supper was established by Jesus to remember His death until He returns.

beliefs.title: The Church & Mission
beliefs.content: We believe the Church is the Body of Christ. Believers should serve together using their gifts. Spreading the Gospel is the Great Commission entrusted to every Christian until the Lord returns.

beliefs.title: Marriage
beliefs.content: We believe marriage is sacred, established by God as the union between one man and one woman. Christians should build Christ-centered, holy families.
